top_comment.text:
The United State voting population has overwhelmingly supported the 
Patriots Act, which does allow for increased surveillance. If Edward 
Snowden believed that this document was unconstitutional then he should 
have leaked the relevant information to a select few lawyers and judges you 
specialize in constitutional law. Instead he totally waived the democratic 
process of the American people and released this information to 
journalists, he then also released information on American spying on 
foreign countries, a completely sane and legal thing to do which all other 
nations themselves are participating in, hugely damaging Americas 
diplomatic ties with other nations. He also, by releasing this information, 
has allowed actual Islamic extremists and terrorists to effectively drop 
off the grid and has greatly reduced the ability of the security agencies 
to Identify and keep watch on those who actually want to do great harm to 
the American population and the populations of other non-Islamic nations as 
well. Perhaps the final act of betrayal was his decision to flee to China, 
a nation with has a much stronger surveillance program on it's population 
not to mention it's innumerable list of human rights abuses and lack of 
democracy and then to flee to Russia a nation which has decided to 
criminalize homosexuality, curtail freedom of speech and has illegally 
invaded a peaceful democratic nation.
It also launched an illegal war against Georgia in 2008. That is why, 
Edward Snowden is a traitor.﻿
top_comment.author: C Taylor

comments.text:
+C Taylor The history of the way the USA treats is political prisoners does 
not encourage patriots who believe they are acting in the common good to 
throw themselves on the mercy of the US military judicial system. This is 
the US not the UK, Denmark or Norway. The US has a bad reputation. Some of 
you guys are calling for his execution before he has been tried. Get real. 
He is a patriot and a very brave man. So in one post the man mentions 
Russia and China so he has to be louse for that reason. Guilt by 
association. That is OK in US politics which are a joke but not when a 
man's health and safety are at issue.
comments.author: Donald Edward

comments.text: yep, you are just so lost.
comments.author: Jessica Putaja

comments.text:
I COULDNT AGREE WITH YOU MORE. PEOPLE WHO SAYS HE IS A PATRIOT REALLY DONT 
UNDERSTAND THE IMPLICATIONS OF WHERE THIS PLACES THE US ON A GLOBAL SCALE. 
WE SIGNED THE PATRIOT ACT WITHOUTH RTEADING THE ENITRE CONTRACT WITH ALL 
THOSE MINOR DETAILS AND THEN WE CLAIM TE GOVT IS OVERSTEPPING OUR RIGHTS.
IM PERTURBED BY SNOWDEN AND I KNOW HE WILL GET A MORE SEVER SENTENCE THAN 
BRADLEY MANNING.
comments.author: sun dance91

top_comment.text:
SNOWDEN IS CLEARLY A TRAITOR. SURE THE GOVT VIOLATED THE CONSTITUTION ON A 
MASS SCALE BUT WHY DID HE HAVE TO GO TO OUR POLIITICAL RIVAL RUSSIA? EVEN 
RUSSIA GAVE HIM TEMPORARY ASYLUM SO ONCE HE IS DONE SPILLING THEY WONT NEED 
HIM ANYMORE. HE IS A BENEDICT ARNOLD AND HE WILL BE TRIED JUST LIKE THE 
ROSENBERGS IN THE 60S AND THE LATE BRADLEY MANNING.﻿
top_comment.author: sun dance91

comments.text: EAT A DICK, U GOVT SHEEP
comments.author: Deez Nuts

comments.text:
So you're willing to forgive a government, who by the way fucked us over 
and disregarded our rights GUARANT-FUCKING-TEED by the constitution, 
because the patriot, american hero, and whistleblower, Edward Snowden, went 
to Russia? Are you fucking stupid? Keep eating the shit of our government, 
who's forefathers probably turned in the grave a couple of times, supplies 
to you. You're the reason big brother gets away with this kind of shit.
comments.author: Dick “TheInternetHateMachine2” Chappy

comments.text:
He went to Russia because he wont get any justice and a fair process in 
America.
He tryed to get to Germany or any other western country but their govt. 
refused to grant him asylum because they are cowards. Many politician in 
Germany want to grant him asylum and wish they do.
comments.author: Revan817

comments.text:
because russia is the only country which will defend snowden for his 
benefits.... safest location on earth from CIA assasianation ofc...
comments.author: Laode Alvian Fazrin
